src:
Makoye Sissoko, ex-directrice de l’AZI-SA
07 Nov 2019 by bamada.net
Selon nos informations, jeudi 31 octobre, l’ex-directrice de l’AZI/SA, Makoye Sissoko, a été déférée à la prison de Bollé, sise à Banankabougou.



 
Elle a été inculpée pour escroquerie et détournements. C’est suite à un audit, après plusieurs plaintes de clients de la société qui avaient acheté des lots à l’AZI/SA.

B.D.

Canard Déchaîne
text:
Makoye Sissoko, former director of AZI-SA
07 Nov 2019 by bamada.net
According to our information, on Thursday October 31, the former director of AZI / SA, Makoye Sissoko, was transferred to Bollé prison, located in Banankabougou.




She was charged with fraud and embezzlement. This was after an audit, after several complaints from customers of the company who had bought lots at AZI / SA.

B. D.

Duck Unleash
